mapper.select: SELECT EZC_CHANNEL_CLIENT.CLIENT_CD AS clientCd /* 고객사 코드, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_CHANNEL_CLIENT.CHANNEL_CD AS channelCd /* 채널 코드, VARCHAR2(10) */ ,EZC_CHANNEL_CLIENT.MARK_TYPE AS markType /* 마크 유형, VARCHAR2(8) */ ,EZC_CHANNEL_CLIENT.MARK_UNIT AS markUnit /* 마크 단위, VARCHAR2(8) */ ,EZC_CHANNEL_CLIENT.MARK_AMT AS markAmt /* 마크 금액, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_CHANNEL_CLIENT.REG_ID AS regId /* 등록자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_CHANNEL_CLIENT.REG_DT AS regDt /* 등록 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ ,EZC_CHANNEL_CLIENT.MODI_ID AS modiId /* 수정자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_CHANNEL_CLIENT.MODI_DT AS modiDt /* 수정 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ FROM EZC_CHANNEL_CLIENT /* 채널 고객사 */ WHERE 1=1 AND EZC_CHANNEL_CLIENT.CLIENT_CD = #{clientCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 고객사 코드, VARCHAR2(20) */ AND EZC_CHANNEL_CLIENT.CHANNEL_CD = #{channelCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 채널 코드, VARCHAR2(10) */

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM EZC_CHANNEL_CLIENT /* 채널 고객사 */ WHERE 1=1
AND EZC_CHANNEL_CLIENT.CLIENT_CD = #{clientCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 고객사 코드, VARCHAR2(20) */
AND EZC_CHANNEL_CLIENT.CHANNEL_CD = #{channelCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 채널 코드, VARCHAR2(10) */

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS ROW__NUM, RECORDS.* FROM ( /* #### SQL Body [[ ################# */ SELECT EZC_CHANNEL_CLIENT.CLIENT_CD AS clientCd /* 고객사 코드, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_CHANNEL_CLIENT.CHANNEL_CD AS channelCd /* 채널 코드, VARCHAR2(10) */ ,EZC_CHANNEL_CLIENT.MARK_TYPE AS markType /* 마크 유형, VARCHAR2(8) */ ,EZC_CHANNEL_CLIENT.MARK_UNIT AS markUnit /* 마크 단위, VARCHAR2(8) */ ,EZC_CHANNEL_CLIENT.MARK_AMT AS markAmt /* 마크 금액, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_CHANNEL_CLIENT.REG_ID AS regId /* 등록자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_CHANNEL_CLIENT.REG_DT AS regDt /* 등록 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ ,EZC_CHANNEL_CLIENT.MODI_ID AS modiId /* 수정자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_CHANNEL_CLIENT.MODI_DT AS modiDt /* 수정 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ FROM EZC_CHANNEL_CLIENT /* 채널 고객사 */ WHERE 1=1
AND EZC_CHANNEL_CLIENT.CLIENT_CD = #{param.clientCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 고객사 코드, VARCHAR2(20) */
AND EZC_CHANNEL_CLIENT.CHANNEL_CD = #{param.channelCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 채널 코드, VARCHAR2(10) */
ORDER BY EZC_CHANNEL_CLIENT.CLIENT_CD DESC /* #### SQL Body ]] ################# */ ) RECORDS WHERE ROWNUM <= ((#{param.pageNum, jdbcType=NUMERIC}*#{param.pageCount, jdbcType=NUMERIC})+1) ) WHERE ROW__NUM > (#{param.pageNum, jdbcType=NUMERIC}-1)*#{param.pageCount, jdbcType=NUMERIC}
mapper.update: UPDATE EZC_CHANNEL_CLIENT SET /* 채널 고객사 */ MARK_TYPE = #{markType, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 마크 유형, VARCHAR2(8) */ ,MARK_UNIT = #{markUnit, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 마크 단위, VARCHAR2(8) */ ,MARK_AMT = #{markAmt, jdbcType=NUMERIC} /* 마크 금액, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,MODI_ID = #{modiId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 수정자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,MODI_DT = #{modiDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 수정 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ WHERE 1=1 AND CLIENT_CD = #{clientCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 고객사 코드, VARCHAR2(20) */ AND CHANNEL_CD = #{channelCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 채널 코드, VARCHAR2(10) */
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM EZC_CHANNEL_CLIENT /* 채널 고객사 */ WHERE 1=1 AND CLIENT_CD = #{clientCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 고객사 코드, VARCHAR2(20) */ AND CHANNEL_CD = #{channelCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 채널 코드, VARCHAR2(10) */
